content: more times 437 sts work two row in stockinette stitch as follows no more increases row 1 knit all stitches row 2 purl all stitches finishing bind off sts loosely sew in ends and block abbreviations k knit k1tbl knit stitch through back look k2tog knit 2 stitches together kfb knit 1 leaving stitch on left needle knit through back loop of the same stitch k1tbl knit stitch through the back loop m1l - make 1 left left leaning increase insert left needle from front to back under the strand of yarn which runs between the next stitch on the left needle and last stitch on the right needle knit this stitch through the back loop m1r make 1 right right leaning increase insert left needle from back to front under the strand of yarn which runs between the next stitch on the left needle and the last stitch on the right needle knit this stitch through the front loop pm place marker p purl p1tbl purl stitch through the back loop repeat repeat rs right side sm slip marker st s stitch es ws wrong side yo yarnover © sonder yarn co 2024 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only
